mapper.select: select reqst_num, reqstore.s_num, reqstore.st_bnum, reqstore.st_name, reqstore.st_address, reqstore.st_email, reqstore.st_hours, reqstore.st_cell, reqstore.st_ceo, reqstore.st_date, store.s_num from reqstore left outer join store on reqstore.s_num=store.s_num where store.s_num is null
mapper.insert: insert into fees (f_num, s_num, f_receiptdate, f_setdate) values(fees_seq.nextval, #{s_num}, sysdate, #{f_setdate})
